sentences.en: A tasteful flavour consisting of Vanilla, Walnut & Honey has been added.
sentences.cn: 香草 、 胡桃 及 蜂蜜精华,齿颊留香.

sentences.en: Among the underemployed is Marty Rasmussen of Walnut Creek, Calif.
sentences.cn: 加州的拉斯穆森(MartyRasmussen)也是就业不足者之一.

sentences.en: As chrysanthemum, rhododendron and walnut, such as an ominous thing.
sentences.cn: 视菊花 、 杜鹃花与核桃等为不祥之物.

sentences.en: Below in the valley lie miles of walnut trees.
sentences.cn: 在下面的山谷里绵延着几英里的核桃树。

sentences.en: Black walnut is extremely sensitive to damage from late spring frosts.
sentences.cn: 黑胡桃对春天晚霜的危害非常敏感.

sentences.en: Black walnut kernels are difficult to get out of the shell.
sentences.cn: 黑核桃的果仁很难从壳中取出.

sentences.en: Black walnut shells are so hard they require special crackers.
sentences.cn: 黑核桃的壳相当硬,因此必须使用特殊的碎裂机.

sentences.en: Please make us a cable offer for 5 metric tons of walnut.
sentences.cn: 请电报5吨核桃仁的价格.

sentences.en: She watches him plane the surface of a walnut board.
sentences.cn: 她看着他刨平一块胡桃木板。

sentences.en: The stool comes in several sizes in walnut or mahogany.
sentences.cn: 凳子有几种尺寸，材质分胡桃木和红木两种。

sentences.en: The table is made of walnut.
sentences.cn: 这桌子是由胡桃木做的.

sentences.en: This was the best pasta with walnut sauce I've ever tasted.
sentences.cn: 这是我吃过的最好的核桃酱面.

sentences.en: To determine the content of elements in Chinese walnut shell by ICP - OEC.
sentences.cn: 采用等离子体原子发射法测定了野核桃壳中的元素含量.

sentences.en: Walnut injury if inadvertently and how should I do?
sentences.cn: 核桃如果不经意损伤了,怎么办?

sentences.en: Walnut is a local specialty here.
Walnut trees that grow too large make it inconvenient to prune, spray, and harvest.
sentences.cn: 生长过大的核桃树,不便于修剪, 喷药和采收.

trans.tran_cn: 胡桃（树），胡桃木，胡桃木色
trans.tran_en: a nut that you can eat, shaped like a human brain
